#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;
ll int a[1000010];
int main()
{
	ll int test;
	scanf("%lld",&test);
	while(test--)
	{
		ll int ans=1;
		ll int i,n;
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		ll int neg=0,pos=0,zero=0; //count of ngative,positive & zero
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%lld",(a+i));
			if(a[i]<0) //Negative
			{
				neg++;
			}
			else if(a[i]>0)
			{
				pos++;
			}
			else if (a[i]==0)
			{
				zero++;
			}
		}
		sort(a,a+n);
		if(n==1)
		{
			ans=(a[0]+mod)%mod;
		}
		else if(neg==1 && pos==0)
		{
			ans=0;
		}
		else if(neg==0 && pos==0) //that means all numbers are zero
		{
			ans=0;
		}
		else
		{
			ans=1;
			for(i=(n-1);(pos!=0);i--)
			{
				ans=(ans*a[i])%mod;
				pos--;
			}
			if(neg & 1) //odd number of negative numbers
			neg--;
			for(i=0;(neg!=0);i++)
			{
				ans=(ans*((a[i]+mod)%mod))%mod;
				neg--;
			}
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
